getDocumentFrequency

public int getDocumentFrequency(int conceptId)
Description copied from interface: ICVIndexReader
The number of documents for which the value for the specified concept of greater than zero. This corresponds to the document frequency in IR.

Specified by:
getDocumentFrequency in interface ICVIndexReader
Parameters:
conceptId - The concept id for which the number of relevant documents is returned.
Returns:
The number of documents that activate the specified concept.
